articles.title: Edan Alexander: Israeli-American hostage released by Hamas in Gaza - BBC
articles.description: Edan Alexander, 21, is the first hostage to be released by Hamas since a ceasefire ended in March.
articles.content:

articles.title: Measles Could Become Endemic in US if Surge Continues, Expert Warns - ScienceAlert

articles.content: Globally, measles is on the rise across the U.S., Canada, Mexico, South America and parts of Europe. In 2025, North and South America saw 11 times more cases than during the same period last year. In… [+7353 chars]
